mapper.sql: id, client_id, name, type, account, password, discount_rate, contact, tel, car_count
mapper.insert: insert into client (id, client_id, name, type, account, password, discount_rate, contact, tel, car_count) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})

client_id,

mapper.update:
update client
client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
discount_rate = #{discountRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_count = #{carCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update client set client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_rate = #{discountRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_count = #{carCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from client where account=#{username} limit 1
mapper.update: update client set car_count=car_count+1 where client_id=#{clientID}
mapper.select: select * from client where client_id=#{clientID} limit 1
